description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 17/15107/FUL (Proposed extension to the existing building at second floor and third floor at the rear and a new fourth floor to accommodate eight new flats (comprising 6 x 1 bed units and 2 x 3 bed units) together with associated works.) to vary drawing numbers of Condition 2 for addition of fifth floor consisting of 5nos additional units (4nos 1 bed units and 1no 2bed unit).
decision_conditions: The proposed development requires changes to the operative part of planning permission ref: 17/15107/FUL which cannot be made under Section 73 of The Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The proposed development comprises fundamental alterations to the development approved under planning permission ref: 17/15107/FUL which is considered to fall outside the scope of Section 73 of The Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
